Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, email, name FROM users;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT p.name, p.city, u.email FROM properties p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "UPDATE properties SET 
  description = ''Hôtel de charme face à la mer, situé sur la pointe de Lervilly avec vue panoramique sur l''''océan Atlantique. Architecture traditionnelle bretonne renovée, restaurant gastronomique, spa et accès direct à la plage privée.'',

  instagram_handle = ''@semaphorelervilly'',
  address = ''Pointe de Lervilly, 56170 Quiberon, France''

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, title FROM videos LIMIT 3;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT name, instagram_handle, website_url, phone, email FROM properties WHERE name LIKE ''%Sémaphore%'';")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT title, hotel_name, username, views, likes FROM viral_video_templates LIMIT 3;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT title, username, followers, views, likes, comments, video_link FROM viral_video_templates LIMIT 3;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT title, hotel_name, script FROM viral_video_templates WHERE script IS NOT NULL LIMIT 2;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT COUNT(*), MIN(title), MAX(title) FROM viral_video_templates;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, hotel_name, views, followers, ROUND(views::float/followers::float, 2) as ratio FROM viral_video_templates ORDER BY views::float/followers::float DESC;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, hotel_name, views, followers, (views::float/followers::float) as ratio FROM viral_video_templates ORDER BY views::float/followers::float DESC;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, hotel_name, title, LEFT(script, 200) as script_preview FROM viral_video_templates WHERE id LIKE ''bc2bcbe3%'' OR id LIKE ''1b263a91%'';")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT hotel_name, title, COUNT(*) as duplicate_count FROM viral_video_templates GROUP BY hotel_name, title HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY duplicate_count DESC;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT hotel_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM viral_video_templates GROUP BY hotel_name ORDER BY count DESC;")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "
INSERT INTO viral_video_templates (id, title, hotel_name, username, property, country, video_link, followers, views, likes, comments, duration, script) VALUES
(
  gen_random_uuid()::text,
  ''Sunset Beach Hotel Paradise'',
  ''Sunset Beach Resort'',
  ''@sunsetbeachhotel'',
  ''beach_resort'',
  ''Maldives'', 
  ''https://instagram.com/reel/beach1'',
  125000,
  950000,
  48000,
  1200,
  28.5,
  ''{""clips"":[{""order"":1,""duration"":8.0,""description"":""Sunset over pristine white sand beach with crystal clear turquoise water, palm trees swaying in gentle breeze""},{""order"":2,""duration"":6.0,""description"":""Luxurious overwater bungalows at golden hour, wooden walkways leading over lagoon""},{""order"":3,""duration"":7.5,""description"":""Infinity pool overlooking ocean, guests relaxing on sun loungers with tropical cocktails""},{""order"":4,""duration"":7.0,""description"":""Private beach dining setup under stars, candles flickering on sand, waves gently lapping shore""}],""texts"":[{""content"":""Paradise Found 🌅"",""start_time"":0},{""content"":""Your Dream Escape Awaits"",""start_time"":8},{""content"":""Book Now - Limited Availability"",""start_time"":22}]}''
),
(
  gen_random_uuid()::text,
  ''City Rooftop Hotel Experience'', 
  ''Metropolitan Heights Hotel'',
  ''@metroheights_hotel'',
  ''city_hotel'',
  ''New York'',
  ''https://instagram.com/reel/city1'',
  89000,
  720000,
  35000,
  890,
  32.0,
  ''{""clips"":[{""order"":1,""duration"":6.0,""description"":""Panoramic city skyline view from rooftop terrace at dusk, skyscrapers illuminated""},{""order"":2,""duration"":8.0,""description"":""Modern hotel lobby with marble floors, crystal chandeliers, guests checking in""},{""order"":3,""duration"":9.0,""description"":""Rooftop bar with craft cocktails, city lights twinkling below, couples enjoying evening""},{""order"":4,""duration"":9.0,""description"":""Elegant hotel room with floor-to-ceiling windows showcasing city view, luxury amenities""}],""texts"":[{""content"":""Urban Luxury ✨"",""start_time"":0},{""content"":""Sky High Experience"",""start_time"":6},{""content"":""Book Your City Escape"",""start_time"":24}]}''
);
")

Bash(/opt/homebrew/bin/psql "postgresql://postgres:bSE10GhpRKVigbkEnzBG@hospup-db2.checoia2yosk.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/postgres" -c "

);
